2020.context: DoorDash, Inc. is a food delivery and local commerce platform focused on restaurant delivery, grocery, convenience, and merchant services. IPO during pandemic food delivery boom. US market leader.

competitors.name: Uber Eats
competitors.notes: Major competitor and #2 in US food delivery market

competitors.name: Grubhub
competitors.notes: Established food delivery platform, acquired by Just Eat Takeaway

competitors.name: Postmates
competitors.notes: Delivery platform acquired by Uber in 2020

competitors.name: Instacart
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery competing for delivery driver supply and consumer attention

competitors.name: Caviar
competitors.notes: Premium restaurant delivery acquired by DoorDash in 2019

competitors.name: Seamless
competitors.notes: Part of Grubhub focused on urban markets

competitors.name: Amazon Restaurants
competitors.notes: Amazon's food delivery attempt (shut down 2019)

competitors.name: Deliveroo
competitors.notes: UK-based delivery platform with international presence

2024.context: DoorDash, Inc. is a food delivery and local commerce platform focused on restaurant delivery, grocery, convenience, and merchant services. Grocery and retail expansion. DashPass subscriber growth.

competitors.name: Uber Eats
competitors.notes: Primary competitor with ~25% US market share, strong international presence

competitors.name: Grubhub
competitors.notes: Distant third in US, owned by Just Eat Takeaway, exploring sale options

competitors.name: Instacart
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery leader, went public in 2023, competing in quick commerce

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Competing via Whole Foods delivery and Amazon Fresh

competitors.name: Gopuff
competitors.notes: Quick commerce/convenience delivery platform

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Grocery delivery through Spark driver network

competitors.name: Target (Shipt)
competitors.notes: Same-day delivery competing in grocery and retail

competitors.name: Deliveroo
competitors.notes: European food delivery competitor

2025.context: DoorDash, Inc. is a food delivery and local commerce platform focused on restaurant delivery, grocery, convenience, and merchant services. Local commerce platform. Competing with Uber Eats, Instacart.

competitors.name: Uber Eats
competitors.notes: Primary competitor globally, part of Uber's broader mobility platform

competitors.name: Instacart
competitors.notes: Grocery and retail delivery competitor with advertising business

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Competing through Prime delivery, Whole Foods, and Amazon Fresh

competitors.name: Walmart
competitors.notes: Massive grocery delivery operation through Spark and partnerships

competitors.name: Gopuff
competitors.notes: Quick commerce platform for convenience items

competitors.name: Grubhub
competitors.notes: Legacy food delivery platform seeking strategic alternatives

competitors.name: Just Eat Takeaway
competitors.notes: European food delivery giant

competitors.name: Deliveroo
competitors.notes: UK/European food delivery competitor

mentionedBy.name: Maplebear Inc. (Instacart)
mentionedBy.notes: Expanding from restaurants into grocery and convenience

mentionedBy.name: Maplebear Inc. (Instacart)
mentionedBy.notes: Expanding grocery and retail delivery marketplace

mentionedBy.name: Maplebear Inc. (Instacart)
mentionedBy.notes: Grocery and retail delivery expanding beyond restaurants

mentionedBy.name: Uber Technologies, Inc.
